title: Foxbody Auction Show w/ Elana Scherr & Andrew P. Collins
description:
This podcast was recorded during the final hour of the auction for Matt's Foxbody Mustang, where 50% of the proceeds went to the buyer's charity of choice. Joining us was Andrew P. Collins of JALOPNIK who told us why you should never  roll a UTV, and Elana Scherr, a lover of all old cars and current writer for Edmunds, and formerly at Hot Rod, Roadkill, and many other places.

 

This show is also a video: https://youtu.be/g68qnD-XdFQ

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman @andrewatlarge @challengeher

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @andrewatlarge @challengeher

 

Check out our merch!

https://teespring.com/stores/thesmokingtire?page=1
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
